sentence.Network_en: We basked in the afterglow of victory.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们沉浸在胜利的余晖中.

sentence.Network_en: A golden afterglow throbbed in the west.
sentence.Network_cn: 金色的晚霞在西方颤动着.

sentence.Network_en: The safety of long afterglow photoluminescence materials is discussed in this paper.
sentence.Network_cn: 本文对光致发光材料的安全问题进行了初步探讨.

entry.def: The afterglow is the glow that remains after a light has gone, for example after the sun has gone down.
You can refer to the good feeling or effects that remain after an event as the afterglow .

example.ex: ...basking in the afterglow of their Champions League victory.
example.tran: 沉浸在他们赢得冠军联赛的美好回忆当中

means.word_mean: 1. a glow sometimes seen in the sky after sunset
2. the pleasure of remembering some pleasant event;

sentences.sentence: "he basked in the afterglow of his victory"

auth_sentence.content: Maybe it was the afterglow of the collapse of the Soviet Union.

auth_sentence.content: We can see the afterglow of the Big Bang We can't see it with the naked eye, but some of our telescopes can.
